ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: My knowledge of the Indonesian language, culture, and history have grown tremendously over the semester.
Learned about Indonesian culture and language
I learned about the Indonesian language and culture.
I have been able to develop speaking skills in Indonesian. I feel as if I have a great grasp of the language
I gained lots of knowledge about the culture in Indonesia as well as a good basic understanding on how  to speak the language.
Extensive learning about Indonesian language, culture and discussion. Very engaging lessons with the greatest professor!
Taught me a good basis of Indonesian whilst also learning some very interesting and important historical Indonesian history

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The strengths of this course are a manageable amount of work and a good balance of learning about culture and language.
Very engaging class environment that makes learning fun and interesting whilst also learning much about Indonesian language and culture in the process.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes. It was a very positive learning environment and was helpful in relieving the stress from other classes.
Yes, I would recommend this course. The Indonesian culture is so fun to learn about and Pak Indriyo makes the class so fun that at times you don't even feel like you're learning.
Yes I think understanding the culture of Indonesia is very interesting and has been something that would be great for students to learn

Absolutely recommend. A brilliant language gut, and the instructor Pak Indryio is also just a lovely guy. He puts so much effort into the class and genuinely cares about his students and their enjoyment of the course.
Yes.  Fun, you learn a lot, reasonable workload, Pak Indriyo is a great teacher.
Most definitely, one of the most enjoyable and informative classes I have taken at Yale
Yes I strongly enjoyed this class and found it a really nice contrast to my other classes
